plugin.name: Khadaji's Graphical Mapper
plugin.author: Khadaji
plugin.description: This is Khadaji's Graphical Mapper for Aardwolf.

plugin.name: Crimson Shroud
plugin.author: Khadaji and CoffeeBreak
plugin.description: Keeps your align lock skill up.
This plugin keeps your align lock up, whether you're in a group or not.

plugin.name: MudBin
plugin.author: Pwar
plugin.description: Useful plugin for saving or sharing mud information while preserving color.

This lets you copy anything from the main output window, press Ctrl+P, and it will post the contents to the mudbin website with the color codes intact, and copy the link to your clipboard for sharing with others.
